mapper.select: SELECT m.id as memberId, m.member_name, m.picture, c.content, c.community_id, c.id, c.register_id, c.register_time FROM com_comment c, member m WHERE c.member_id = m.id and c.community_id = #{communityId}
SELECT count(1) from com_comment where community_id = #{communityId}

select a.id, a.content, b.title, b.id as communityId, b.menu_id as menuId, (select name from community_menu where id = b.menu_id) as menuName, a.register_time as date from com_comment a, community b where a.community_id = b.id and a.member_id = #{memberId} order by a.id LIMIT #{page},#{size}
SELECT count(1) FROM com_comment where member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT a.id, a.title, a.member_id as memberId, count(1) as cnt FROM community a, com_comment b WHERE a.id = b.community_id and a.member_id = #{memberId} and b.read_yn is null GROUP BY a.id , a.title, a.member_id
SELECT count(1) as cnt FROM community a, com_comment b WHERE a.id = b.community_id and a.member_id = #{memberId} and b.read_yn is null
mapper.update: UPDATE com_comment SET read_yn = 1, update_time = SYSDATE(), update_id = register_id WHERE community_id = #{communityId}
